original: By centralizing factories far from any borders, we will boost our production while also protecting them from any would-be conquerors.
translation: 工厂集中在远离边界的中部地区，将提高我们的生产效率同时保护他们免遭潜在敌人的入侵。

original: It is not enough for towns to established to thrive - they must also be supported to reach their full potential.
translation: 目前的城镇还是不够繁荣，必须充分发展城镇的潜力。

original: Much of our railway is scattered and disconnected. By adding the necessary stretches we gain much needed transportation capabilities.
translation: 我们的铁路目前无法形成一个有效的铁路网。需要通过修建新铁路提高我们急需的运输能力。

original: Lay the foundation for our centralized armament industry.
translation: 为我们的军事工业区奠定基础。

original: Keep expanding our centralized armaments industry.
translation: 不断扩大我们的军事工业区。

original: We must plan for the expansion of our infrastructure to accommodate not only our present industry, but also our the future.
translation: 我们必须有计划的建设基础设施以适应国家未来的发展。

original: Citizens and state alike must contribute to the funding of our growing industry, to prepare for the perils of the years to come.
translation: 人民和政府都必须为我们日益发展的国家提供资金，以应对未来几年的潜在威胁。

original: Warsaw is a nexus of transport and cargo. To avoid bottlenecks, extra effort is to be placed on the management of its railway.
translation: 华沙是重要的交通枢纽。为避免出现拥堵，需额外的注重铁路管理。

original: Invest In The Old Polish Region
Modernize old factories in Kielce, Skarzysko, Radom, Starachowice and Ostrowiec, while also building new ones to strengthen our industry.
translation: 推动凯尔采等地的老旧工厂现代化，同时建立新的工厂加强我们的工业。

original: Upper Silesia has been contested since the Great War. Developing the region will unite the people of the area and improve our industry.
translation: 一战之后上西里西亚地区主权一直存有争议。我们将通过发展该地使人民团结起来同时提高我们的工业能力。

original: Our industrial expansion and other recent advances might allow us to conduct more R&D in parallel.
translation: 我们工业的发展允许我们同时进行更多的研究。

original: The "Cryptologic Bombe" is a development of the Cyclometer, and allows us to decipher the progressively more advanced versions of the German Enigma cipher.
translation: “炸弹”破译机是一种先进的破译机， 将允许我们逐步破译更高级的德国恩尼格玛密码。

original: With this invention, the ciphers of the Germans will become plain as clear text. No secrets will be kept from us.
translation: 这项发明的成功，德国人将不会再有秘密。

original: We must not lose the chance to be the first to discover a way to harness the primal fire of fission.
translation: 我们一定要得到第一个发现核裂变技术的机会。

original: The rapid industrialization of our nation has opened up new opportunities in R&D that we should pursue.
translation: 我们国家工业的快速发展使我们的研发获得了新机遇，我们应该利用好。

original: The Great War may only have been the first of its kind. We must prepare for what must surely be an ever-changing battlefield.
translation: 上次世界大战可能只是开始，我们必须准备下一次战争。

original: Even bolder stratagems must be devised if the defense of our homeland is to succeed.
translation: 只要能成功保卫我们的国土，什么样的大胆策略都可以使用。

original: Should the fighting turn against us, we must have plans in place for effective regrouping and retaliation in concert with our friends and allies.
translation: 战争逼近， 针对我们的盟友和朋友必须拿出一个有效的预备计划。

original: More forts constructed in the south will secure additional defenses.
translation: 更多永固要塞的建立将有效提高当地防御能力。

original: By fortifying key areas we make ourselves less vulnerable, should war again come to our shores and borders.
translation: 战争可能再次燃烧在海岸线，我们必须加强防御使当地看起来并不是毫无防备。

original: By standardizing the equipment of our soldiers we set the foundation for a modern supply apparatus.
translation: 通过将装备标准化为我们的部队实现现代化奠定基础。

original: While the cavalry still has a role to play, we need new metal mounts for it to compete on the modern battlefield.
translation: 骑兵仍然有用，我们需要新式骑兵出现在现代战场。

original: These "tanks" will be a central part of todays armed conflicts, and we must make sure to keep pace with our neighbors, by any means necessary.
translation: 这些“坦克”可能将成为未来战争的主力，我们必须通过任何手段确保跟上我们邻居的技术水平。

original: With the basics of tank design in place, we are now ready to start forging our own path in the tangled field of mechanized design.
translation: 我们已经掌握坦克设计的基本知识，现在我们已经准备好涉及复杂的坦克。

original: We must not neglect to improve and modernize the support our soldiers require for effective deployment.
translation: 我们决不忽视对火炮的改进，这能对我们的士兵提供更有效的支援。

original: Any enemy is sure to deploy tanks against us. We must be prepared to give them a warm welcome.
translation: 针对我们敌人的坦克，我们必须准备好给他们坦克一个热烈的拥抱。

original: Airbases are as essential to air support as air support is to modern warfare.
translation: 现代战争里空中支援是非常重要的一部分。

original: The mainstay of any air force, our fighters must not be made obsolete. As the rest of our air force improves, so must they.
translation: 战斗机作为空军的中流砥柱，性能上绝不能落后。随着我们空军其余机种的改良，它们也必须现代化。

original: There is still much to be done in the field of aerial strategy and tactics.
translation: 仍有许多航空领域的战略和战术需要改进。

original: Should we be forced to go on the offensive, we need a new kind of fighter that can operate at length inside hostile borders.
translation: 我们应继续研究一种新型战斗机，以应对漫长边界线的需要。

original: Air supremacy is as important at sea as over land. Specialized aircraft developed for the purpose of naval warfare is a way to achieve that aim.
translation: 制空权在海上一样很重要。为海战的需要开发专业的飞机以达到胜利的目的。

original: An extension of the precision bombing philosophy adapted for extended range to be used in support roles.
translation: 精准轰炸应有更广泛的用途。

original: The value of using dive bombers for close air support should not be underestimated.
translation: 俯冲轰炸机进行近距离空中支援的价值不应被低估。

original: Aviation theory is just as important as technology. New stratagems for our pilots are still waiting to be discovered.
translation: 航空理论是一样重要的技术。许多新战略等着被我们的飞行员发现。

original: Speed is the attribute on which all other aerial attributes rely. Rocket and jet engines could theoretically allow us to pass all previous limits.
translation: 速度是所有性能中最为重要的，火箭和喷气发动机理论上可以允许我们突破之前的速度。

original: Our nation's inland location is no excuse to neglect our naval efforts.
translation: 我们国家的地理环境注定我们不能忽视海军的建设。

original: New kinds of ships are continuously being developed by our neighbors. We must study them, or we will find our own antiquated.
translation: 我们的邻居正在不断研发新型船舶，我们必须研究他们的船舶技术，不然就会落后。

original: Increasingly larger ships will be needed to make a reality of our plans for a sea presence.
translation: 我们的海军计划需要越来越大的船只。

original: A submarine gap is unacceptable. We will have the technology, even if we must purchase it.
translation: 目前潜艇技术的差距是不可接受的。我们难以研发，所以我们必须购买它的技术。

original: No navy is complete without submarines. Ours need to be organized for optimal lethality, just like the rest of the fleet.
translation: 潜艇是非常规的海军。我们需要通过特定战术将它有效利用起来， 和其他舰队一样为国家效力。

original: By focusing on the counter-tactics needed to oppose our most likely enemies we will keep the upper hand in naval combat.
translation: 通过在战场上重点照顾最合适的敌人我们将保持海战的优势。

original: A short-range, mobile naval defense force could potentially do the work of many times their strength in stationary fortifications.
translation: 在近距离的情况下， 可能正确的移动海军防卫力量提供的防御效率会比他们静止的时候好得多。

original: In case we lack in numbers, we need a rapidly deployed force of warships to be able to strike at the enemy where he is weakest.
translation: 我们没有数量的优势，所以我们需通过实行快速打击敌人的薄弱环节来获得战争的优势。

original: A thorough effort to reinvent our naval strategy will be of great importance if we are to utilize our ships in the Baltic.
translation: 利用我们在波罗的海的船只，彻底重塑我们的海军战略非常重要。

original: We cannot afford to stand divided. Our strength to enact changes is proportional to our unity in both senate and sejm.
translation: 我们不能忍受分裂。我们的力量因我们的团结在参议院和色姆越来越强大。

original: We will not start the next war, but we will make sure we finish it.
translation: 我们不会主动发起下一场战争，但我们会确保我们能结束它。

original: Previous wars may have bowed us, but we are not defeated. We shall rise again, by the bravery of our soldiers and the cunning of our officers.
translation: 以前的战争可能我们低头了，但我们没有被打败。现在我们士兵更勇敢军官更睿智，我们将再次崛起。

original: Few nations have lost so much in so little time. If there is any justice, we will regain it, one way or another.
translation: 国家失去太多时间刻不容缓。如果还有正义，不择手段也要得到。

original: The good of the nation must take precedence to so-called "truths." Just as we forge our own destiny, we must forge our own facts.
translation: 国家利益高于一切。我们必须认清这一事实。

original: No sacrifice is too great for our cause. Just like the zealots of the old religions, everyone must be prepared to take lives or give their own for the sake of our ways.
translation: 没有为我们的事业而牺牲更伟大的事了。就像旧宗教的狂热者，为了信仰每个人都必须改变自己的生活方式。

original: We are not alone in our struggle. If we can gather enough allies, we might be able to challenge our enemies on our own terms.
translation: 我们的斗争并不孤单。如果我们能够拉到足够的盟友，将可以用我们自己的方式可以挑战敌人。

original: Old grudges need to stay in the past. Every friend is needed in the dark times ahead.
translation: 旧的恩怨留在过去。前方的黑暗每个人都需要朋友。

original: One can never have enough friends.
The enemies of our enemies can be our friends.
translation: 敌人的敌人就是我们的朋友。

original: Democracy is a weak solution to tough problems. If power is to be wielded with force, it must be freed from the shackles of consensus.
translation: 民主解决不了迫切棘手的问题。如果权力集中，就没有任何问题。

original: Military principles have applications outside the military arena. With every part of society trained in these disciplines, every citizen will be able to take up arms at a moment's notice.
translation: 军队之外也应该进行军事训练。随着社会的每一部分都进行过军事训练，每个公民都能随时拿起武器战斗。

original: Strength is the only quality worth pursuing. Our neighbors have embraced this truth, and so must we.
translation: 拳头大就是真理。我们的邻居已经接受了这个事实，所以我们也必须跟上。

original: Enrolling our young in organizations promoting discipline and national ideology will breed a loyal generation of future recruits.
translation: 招收我们的年轻人，对他们有组织宣传纪律和国家意识形态，培育成未来的忠诚战士。

original: Why should we fight, when we are more alike than different?
translation: 我们为什么要战斗？我们应该求同存异。

original: Only by uniting our people can we prevail against the foes that threaten to consume us.
translation: 只有团结我们的人民，才能战胜我们的敌人。

original: In order to maintain control of the military, political officers will be appointed to ensure military adherence to the party policies.
translation: 为了保持对军队的控制，将任命政治军官将以确保军队坚持党的政策。

original: The USSR want war as little as we do. Perhaps there is a way to reconcile our history without bloodshed.
translation: 苏联想对我们发动战争。也许有一种没有流血的方法可以调解。

original: We will not stoop to the level of despots and dictators. Never forget that a state serves its people, and not the opposite.
translation: 我们不会屈尊暴君和独裁者的统治。领导应为人民服务，而不是相反。

original: If we value freedom, we need to safeguard it not only for us, but for nations everywhere. If this means war, so be it!
translation: 如果我们重视自由，我们不仅仅需要好好保护我们自己的自由，而且应该保护所有国家的。如果这意味着战争，就让它来吧！

original: The British have committed to protect our independence in the face of aggressors. We need to make the necessary gestures of appreciation.
translation: 英国人致力于保护我们的独立。我们需要进行必要的手段改善我们的关系。

original: Freedom cannot be enforced by the unwilling, or it would become a travesty. Those who take arms for liberty by choice must be given the means to do so, however.
